cards.pay.paycardsrecognizer.sdk.camera.gles

Class Sprite2d

  • java.lang.Object
    • cards.pay.paycardsrecognizer.sdk.camera.gles.Sprite2d

  • public final class Sprite2d
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for a 2d object. Includes position, scale, rotation, and flat-shaded color.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Sprite2d(Drawable2d drawable)

      Returns the model-view matrix.

      Returns the position on the X axis.

      Gets the sprite rotation angle, in degrees.

      Returns the sprite scale along the X axis.
      float getScaleY()
      Returns the sprite scale along the Y axis.

      Sets color to use for flat-shaded rendering.

      • getRotation

        public float getRotation()
        Gets the sprite rotation angle, in degrees.

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(float angle)
        Sets the sprite rotation angle, in degrees. Sprite will rotate counter-clockwise.

      • getPositionX

        public float getPositionX()
        Returns the position on the X axis.

      • getPositionY

        public float getPositionY()
        Returns the position on the Y axis.

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(float posX,
                        float posY)
        Sets the sprite position.

      • getModelViewMatrix

        public float[] getModelViewMatrix()
        Returns the model-view matrix.

        To avoid allocations, this returns internal state. The caller must not modify it.

      • setColor

        public void setColor(float red,
                     float green,
                     float blue)
        Sets color to use for flat-shaded rendering. Has no effect on textured rendering.

      • setTexture

        public void setTexture(int textureId)
        Sets texture to use for textured rendering. Has no effect on flat-shaded rendering.

      • getColor

        public float[] getColor()
        Returns the color.

        To avoid allocations, this returns internal state. The caller must not modify it.

      • draw

        public void draw(Texture2dProgram program,
                 float[] projectionMatrix)
        Draws the rectangle with the supplied program and projection matrix.
